rule.name: Security - Potential SQL/JDOQL Injection (JDO)
rule.description:
The input values included in SQL queries need to be passed in safely. Bind variables in prepared statements can be use to easily mitigate the risk of SQL injection.

Vulnerable Code:

PersistenceManager pm = getPM();

Query q = pm.newQuery("select * from Users where name = " + input);
q.execute();

Solution:

PersistenceManager pm = getPM();

Query q = pm.newQuery("select * from Users where name = nameParam");
q.declareParameters("String nameParam");
q.execute(input);
